amendatorysection.catchline: Cities of the metropolitan class; mayor, city council; terms; city council districts; qualifications.
amendatorysection.para: In a city of the metropolitan class, the mayor and seven city council members shall be elected for terms of four years at the general election pursuant to section 14-201. One city council member shall be nominated and elected from each of the districts into which the city is divided pursuant to section 14-201.03. The city council members shall meet the qualifications found in sections 14-204 and 14-230.
